SELECT A.id AS woId, A.wo_code AS woCode, A.work_date AS workDate, A.quantity AS quantity,
B.id AS ppId, B.pp_code AS ppCode,
C.id AS prId, C.pr_code AS prCode,
D.line_name AS lineName
FROM work_order A JOIN production_plan B ON A.pp_id = B.id JOIN production_request C ON A.pr_id = C.id LEFT JOIN production_line D ON B.production_line_id = D.id
WHERE A.pp_id = #{ppId} ORDER BY A.work_date ASC
